title: Netaji Stadium
text:
Netaji Stadium is a multi-purpose stadium in <a href="Port%20Blair">Port Blair</a>, <a href="Andaman%20and%20Nicobar%20Islands">Andaman and Nicobar Islands</a>. The stadium hosts the major local <a href="association%20football">football</a> and <a href="cricket">cricket</a> matches, and other public events.
There were proposal and international level cricket stadium to be constructed in these Islands where a few <a href="Ranji%20Trophy">Ranji Trophy</a> matches could be organized to begin with simultaneously the <a href="Andaman%20%26amp%3B%20Nicobar%20Cricket%20Association">Andaman & Nicobar Cricket Association</a> need be formed and affiliated and registered with <a href="Board%20of%20Control%20for%20Cricket%20in%20India">BCCI</a> in tune with other state Associations.
